module.name: non_feature_shape_element
module.keywords: module, non feature, shape, element, seating, interface, plane, mark, relationship

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe shapes and portions of shapes, that are defined for not real features, in the product model (for example annotation information). Relationships between them are also supported. Few specific purposes of non feature shape portions are defined: visual indication of reference alignment for tooling purposes and description of an interface plane.

inscope.li: identification of a non feature shape representing information, that is not real feature, in the product model. For example annotation information;
identification of a non feature shape, that defines meta information for physical shape;
identification of a portion of a non feature shape without it's purpose definition;
identification of a portion of a non feature shape used to visually indicate a reference alignment for tooling purposes;
identification of a portion of a non feature shape used specifically for the purpose of providing a description of an interface plane;
relationship between two non feature shape;
relationship between two portions of non feature shape;
items within the scope of Basic_geometry_arm;
items within the scope of Layered_2d_shape_arm;
items within the scope of Shape_property_assignment_arm.

ae.refpath: {[{shape_representation <= representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = shape_definition shape_definition shape_definition = shape_aspect shape_aspect {shape_aspect shape_aspect.product_definitional = .FALSE.}}] [shape_representation <= (representation.id ='nfsd') (representation.id ='vlnfsd')]}

ae.refpath: (mapped_item {mapped_item <= representation_item.name = 'non feature shape annotation'}) (representation_relationship_with_transformation <= {representation_relationship representation_relationship.description = 'non feature shape annotation'})
